channel.title: The amount of fail is off the charts
channel.description:
[img]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/4808/moparfailnq4.png[/img]
^ And people wonder why their "servers" are unstable and don't work half the time...
This is worse than usual, lol. Someone please shut down moparisthebest.com so the balance can be restored. :P

item.title: The amount of fail is off the charts
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:14, topic:204426”][quote author=Niall link=topic=269924.msg2218827#msg2218827 date=1210429558]
Do you want to propose a solution or just continue dicking about like you have been lately?
[/quote]
The solution was already stated. Delete MoparScape, once and for all.[/quote]

Sorry but how will that help?

This forum gets most of it’s revenue from moparscape, and excluding all the runescape stuff, the only thing this forum would have after being deleted is a ready made chat forum, even then, there are less than 5k people with more than 50 posts, and I’m willing to bet at least 75% of those are inactive or gained that many posts from mscp.

So apart from the runescape boards, I really don’t see how this forum will have enough revenue from ads to keep going on.

Read full topic
item.source: The amount of fail is off the charts

[center] Points to the rules[/center]

item.title: The amount of fail is off the charts

item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Good Golly miss molly, you sure do know how to make yourself look like a fucking douche, Mod Furkan. You’re not a nerd at all. Saying shit like that on a RuneScape cheating community is the brightest idea you’ll ever have.

item.title: The amount of fail is off the charts
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:14, topic:204426”][quote author=Niall link=topic=269924.msg2218827#msg2218827 date=1210429558]
Do you want to propose a solution or just continue dicking about like you have been lately?
[/quote]
The solution was already stated. Delete MoparScape, once and for all.[/quote]

Won’t happen, too much traffic comes from it. If there’s no moparscape, then how will Moparisthebest pay for this side of the site? I don’t know if that’s true, but correct me if I’m wrong.

You guys are making fun of little kids. Which is basicly like a 9th grader picking on a 6th grade for not knowing Alegbra.

Go ahead and say I’m a moparscaper, but frankly I don’t care.

Read full topic
